ai.summary: Henie Track is a short, easy 0.6 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. It follows a rural footpath with gentle scenery and minimal elevation.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat, well-defined path with grassy and compacted dirt surfaces. May be muddy after rain and may include occasional gates.
ai.safety_notes: Even on short walks, check the weather and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light layer. Stay on the marked path, watch for muddy sections, and supervise children. Carry a phone and water.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline access
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the best conditions in spring and early autumn when daylight and ground conditions are favorable.

seo.title: Henie Track – Easy 0.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Henie Track, a 0.6 km easy hike in the UK. Ideal for beginners and families, with practical safety tips and gear recommendations.
